title: Odell Beckham Jr wore a $350,000 watch while playing his first game with the Cleveland Browns
text:
Odell Beckham Jr. is known for his flashy play on the field.

But during his debut game with the Cleveland Browns on Sunday, Beckham took his flashiness to a whole new level by wearing a Richard Mille watch worth $350,000 on the field.

Fans on Twitter were quick to notice Beckham's bold fashion choice.

Andrew Joseph at For The Win noted that the watch appeared to be an RM 11-03 McLaren Flyback Chronograph, priced at $350,000.

Read more: Rafael Nadal wore a $725,000 watch while he was winning the French Open

While plenty of NFL players have worn valuable jewelry on the field before, whether as necklaces or piercings, Beckham's wristwatch was an impressive step into new territory of on-field football fashion.

Unfortunately for Beckham, his watch didn't help the Browns to victory. While Beckham finished the game with seven catches for 71 yards, Cleveland was ultimately blown out by the Titans 43-13.
